msg.msgText:
The IBM MessageSight plug-in configurations can be viewed by using the "show" option of the "imaserver" command.
SYNTAX: imaserver show Plugin help imaserver show Plugin "Name=value"
EXAMPLE: imaserver show Plugin "Name=json_msg"
The content of the plugin.json configuration file is returned.

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
